I havent been sleeping either (affective problems though) but I must 
say this was a cheap shot. You have to admit the targets were a 
logical choice in order to start a war. If they had succeeded in 
killing the top officers of the US armies, the president and did 
destroy (as they unfortunately did) the WTC, it would have meant a 
political and economical paralysis for the US, as well as a TOTAL (and 
I mean it) loss of morale for your country... even worse than it now 
is. May the souls of the dead find peace and the most lethally wounded 
find it soon so they dont suffer. 
BTW:Im usually not in favor of war (in this case, its not another 
country so US cant declare war) but I dont think it can be avoided. In 
the case it comes sooner than expected, then good luck surviving it...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Ah hell... I ain't sleeping tonight... this shit is serious...
